mapper.insert: insert into f_fund_level (fund_info_code, level1, level2, level3, level4, level5, level6, level7, level8, level9, level10, level11, level12, level13, level14, level15, level16, level17, level18, level19, level20) values (#{fundInfoCode},#{level1},#{level2}, #{level3}, #{level4}, #{level5}, #{level6}, #{level7}, #{level8}, #{level9}, #{level10},#{level11},#{level12}, #{level13}, #{level14}, #{level15}, #{level16}, #{level17}, #{level18}, #{level19}, #{level20});
mapper.select: select ffl.id, ffl.fund_info_code AS fundInfoCode, ffl.level1, ffl.level2, ffl.level3, ffl.level4, ffl.level5, ffl.level6, ffl.level7, ffl.level8, ffl.level9, ffl.level10, ffl.level11, ffl.level12, ffl.level13, ffl.level14, ffl.level15, ffl.level16, ffl.level17, ffl.level18, ffl.level19, ffl.level20, ffi.fund_name AS fundName, ffi.max_net_worth_date AS maxNetWorthDate, ffi.max_net_worth AS maxNetWorth, ffnwt.level_number AS levelNumber from f_fund_level ffl left join f_fund_info ffi on ffi.fund_code=ffl.fund_info_code left join f_fund_net_worth_temp ffnwt on ffnwt.fund_info_code=ffl.fund_info_code order by ffi.sorting limit #{page} , #{limit};

select id, fund_info_code AS fundInfoCode, level1, level2, level3, level4, level5, level6, level7, level8, level9, level10, level11, level12, level13, level14, level15, level16, level17, level18, level19, level20 from f_fund_level where fund_info_code=#{id}
